name: Bedazzled HD
description:
The new match 3 puzzle game from the makers of hit game, Jewel Dive!
Enjoy this classic game with an HD makeover!

◊ BEAUTIFUL graphics that will make your eyes sparkle!
◊ DAZZLING jewel combination effects!
◊ ASTOUNDING sounds that will immerse you into the experience!
◊ Facebook integration that will let you share and compete with your friends!
◊ COMPLETELY FREE FOREVER!
